# Lionheart (Spell)
## Overview
[[Abjuration Spells|Abjuration]] \[[[Mind-Affecting Spells|mind-affecting]]]

**Level:** [[1st Level Paladin Spells|Paladin 1]]

**BoXM:** [[BoXM 2nd-Level Cleric Spells List|Cleric 2]]

**Casting Time:** 1 standard action

**Components:** V, S, M (a hair from a lionâ€™s mane)

**Range:** Touch

**Target:** Creature touched

**Duration:** 1 round/level

**Saving Throw:** Will negates (harmless)

**Spell Resistance:** Yes (harmless)

**Source:** Spell Compendium (WotC), pg. 133

*You touch your ally while intoning the spell. Where your finger touches, a warm glow appears, then fades.*

The subject gains immunity to fear effects.
